events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations.
The customer's issue has been categorized under Refund based on their request to return the product and get their money back.
Assigning this refund request case to Agent Sarah W. for further handling and customer communication.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I understand you want to request a refund and Iâ€™m here to help you with that.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the product is unopened or unused so we can start the refund process?
Sure, my order number is 8743921. The product package is unopened and I have not used it at all.
Thank you for the info. I have initiated your refund, and you will receive a full refund within 5-7 business days after we receive the return shipment.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate your help and will send the product back today.
We have received your returned product and processed the refund. The money should appear in your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund in full, and if there is anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, I have received the refund amount today. Everything is great, thank you for your excellent support!
Closing the case as the refund has been successfully processed and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
A satisfaction survey has been sent to the customer to gather feedback about their refund experience.
